statements: DELETE FROM patient_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3 AND feedback_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM patient_feedback WHERE rating < 3 AND feedback_text LIKE '%poor%';
DELETE FROM satisfaction_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score > 7 AND patient_id = 5;
DELETE FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 5 AND question_id = 3;
DELETE FROM patient_feedbacks WHERE feedback_id = 101 AND patient_id = 201;
DELETE FROM survey_responses WHERE response_id = 301 AND patient_id = 201 AND survey_id = 401;
